hero.title: A Local Mission With a Global Vision
hero.subtitle: Developing sustainable businesses focused on niche opportunities and innovative technologies.

home_about.title: An Innovation Hub with a Global Vision
home_about.description: Established in 2011 in the State of Qatar, IIS Holding is a local firm owned by a branch of the Qatar Royal family. We partner, support, and invest in innovative businesses locally and globally, with a focus on healthcare, finance, sustainability, and real estate.
